itemDescription: British administrator and author associated with the Scottish fishing industry

wikipedia_page.main: David Thomas Jones FRSE FRSS CBE (1866-1931) was a British administrator and author associated with the Scottish fishing industry.

response: * D. T. Jones (David Thomas Jones, 1899–1963), Labour Party Member of Parliament for Hartlepool, 1945–1959
* David Thomas Jones (administrator) (1866–1931), British administrator and author
David Thomas Jones (17 October 1899 – 4 April 1963), also known as Dai Jones, was a British Labour Party politician.
* David Thomas Jones CBE, FRSE (1866-1931), administrator and author on the fishing industry
